category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Please select here which accent of English should be used. This is mainly used to determine the date format.
Please insert here how many comments should be displayed per page. This setting doesn't influence the visability of comments (that depends on settings of the specific content blocks).

Please insert here the default meta above content. You can change this setting for each content block in the template edit form. Available variables:
  • $datetime
  • $date
  • $time
  • $comments
  • $author
  • $authorVCard
  • $categories
  • $tags

Please insert here the default meta below content. You can change this setting for each content block in the template edit form. Available variables:
  • $datetime
  • $date
  • $time
  • $comments
  • $author
  • $authorVCard
  • $categories
  • $tags
Please insert here the default length after which contents should be truncated.

Please check this checkbox if you want to use the WYSIWYG editor to create and edit contents. If the editor is not used, some convenience functions will not work (include smileys into content by clicking on them, including attachments into content with a click).
If checked sidebars of templates will be collapsible (if existing). This does only apply to sidebars on the right side. Sidebars on the left side will never be collapsible.
Please insert here the sort field for the category list.
Please insert here the sort order for the category list.
Please insert here the sort field for the content list.
Please insert here the sort order for the content list.
Please insert here the sort field for the page list.
Please insert here the sort order for the page list.
Please insert here the sort field for the template list.
Please insert here the sort order for the template list.
Please insert here the sort field for the widget configuration list.
Please insert here the sort order for the widget configuration list.
Please select here the category from which links should be shown. If no category is selected then no links are shown.

category.name: wcf.acp.ultimate
category.item: The 'selected' status is invalid, because you couldn't select it.
At least one of the 'selected' groups wasn't selectable.
You have to select at least one group.
Are you sure that you want to delete this block?
Are you sure that you want to delete this category?

The slug may contain lower-case and upper-case letters as well as numbers. The slug can contain multiple parts, separated by a dash (-). The first part may only contain lower-case and upper-case letters.
A category with the specified slug already exists with this parent.
The 'selected' category is invalid, because you couldn't select it.
Show the contents of this category
Are you sure that you want to delete this content?
Assign the following contents to the selected categories
The title has to be at least 4 characters long.
The description has to be at least 4 characters long.

The slug may contain lower-case and upper-case letters as well as numbers. The slug can contain multiple parts, separated by a dash (-). The first part may only contain lower-case and upper-case letters.
A content with the specified slug already exists.
At least one of the 'selected' categories wasn't selectable.
Two friends go to the beach nearly every day during summer time. They play with each other and have extremely much fun. Tom likes the warm water and the wunderful beach.

Please select here the visibility of the content. Public means everybody can see the content. Protected means that only selected groups can see the content. Private means that only you can see the content.
You have 'selected' a layout which wasn't selectable.
You have 'selected' a template which wasn't selectable.
You have forgotten to select a template for a layout that requires a template.
Are you sure that you want to delete the link?
Assign the following links to the selected categories
This page shows examples about the usage of examples.
You have inserted an illegal URL.
A link with the specified URL already exists.
At least one of the 'selected' categories wasn't selectable.
Are you sure that you want to delete this link category?
You have to create the menu before you can add menu items.
Are you sure that you want to delete this menu?
Are you sure that you want to delete this menu item?
A menu with the specified name already exists.
Please select here the categories, that you want to add to the menu.
Please select here the pages, that you want to add to the menu.
The meta description has a maximum length of 255 characters.
The meta keywords have a total length of 255 characters.
A page with the specified title already exists with this parent.

The slug may contain lower-case and upper-case letters as well as numbers. The slug can contain multiple parts, separated by a dash (-). The first part may only contain lower-case and upper-case letters.
A page with the specified slug already exists with this parent.
The 'selected' page is invalid, because you couldn't select it.
You have to select one content.
Please select here the visibility of the page. Public means everybody can see the page. Protected means that only selected groups can see the page. Private means that only you can see the page.
Are you sure that you want to delete this template?
You have to create the template before you can add blocks.
If checked the widget area is shown.
The 'selected' side side is invalid, because you couldn't select it.
The 'selected' widget configuration is invalid, because you couldn't select it.
The 'selected' menu is invalid, because you couldn't select it.

The content block is extremely versatile. If the default mode is selected, it will behave the way you expect it to do. For example if you use the block on a template which is being used for a page, the content of that page will be displayed. If the template is used for a category then the contents of the categories will be shown. If it is used for a single content then this content will be displayed. If you want to change the behaviour of the block then select 'Custom query' and modify the query filters.
Note: These settings have no effect unless the query mode is set to 'Custom query'.
If you select a page then the content of this page will be displayed under all circumstances. It doesn't matter which page type you visit (Index, category, page, content).

You can select here multiple categories. In connection with the category mode only contents of the selected categories are displayed or only contents not in the selected categories are displayed. If no categories are selected this setting will be ignored.

If you select include only contents of the selected categories are displayed. If you select exclude only contents not in the selected categories are displayed. If no categories are selected this setting will be ignored.
Only contents of the selected authors are displayed. If no author is selected this setting will be ignored.
Please insert here how many contents should be displayed on an archive page (Index, category). By default 10 contents are displayed.
The offset is a number which stands for the amount of contents which should be skipped. If the offset is 1 the first content, which should be displayed, will be skipped.

If checked the titles of the contents in this block will be hidden.
Otherwise the titles will be displayed.

The content body is the actual body of the content. This is what you enter into the editor while creating a new content. If set to 'Default', Ultimate CMS will determine if full contents or excerpts should be displayed based off of the 'Featured contents' setting and what page is being displayed.
Tip: Set this to 'Hide content bodies' to create a simple listing of contents.
By default all contents are displayed. However there might be a situation in which you'd like to show the content in one block and the comments in another. That is possible with this setting.

By default comments are only displayed on single content pages. But you can change this setting to display comments for the contents of single pages.
Tip: You can create unique templates in connection with the 'Hide content' setting by displaying the contents in one block an the comments in another.

Featured contents are displayed in full length unless a 'read more'-BBCode is used.
If all featured contents are displayed the remaining contents are automatically truncated.

If checked you can't use the InlineEdit to change the content directly in the frontend.
For the InlineEdit you require the same rights to write, edit or delete contents.
The content meta is the information which appears both above and under the content body. The default settings can be modified in the ACP.
Please select on which page types the meta information should be displayed. If nothing is selected this setting will be ignored.
A media block can embed an audio file, a video or a photo. You just need the URL. Please select here which media type should be used.
Please select here a media type. Audio and photo accept only direct links to a file. Video supports in addition to a simple file all major video hosting sites.
Please insert here the complete link (with HTTP/HTTPS) to the file or hosted video. Do not use the embed URLs of the video hosting sites. Just the link you see directly in your browser.
Please select here the MIME-type of the linked file. If you embed a video from a hosting portal, this setting is irrelevant. The MIME-type is necessary to embed the file.
Please insert here the height of the media. The embedded media will be resized to that height.
Please insert here the width of the media. The embedded media will be resized to that width.
Please select here the alignment of the media block.
Are you sure that you want to delete this widget configuration?
You have to create a widget configuration first.

category.name: wcf.user.profile
category.item: Created the article {@$content->getLangTitle()}.
Posted a comment to {@$content->getLangTitle()} by {$author->username}.
Replied to a comment by {$commentAuthor->username} to {@$content->getLangTitle()} b< {$author->username}.

category.name: ultimate.category
category.item: All contents that are used by pages should be in this category, be it directly or indirectly. All contents that are in this category directly or indirectly, are not used for 'Recent Activities'.

category.name: ultimate.error
category.item: There is no template attached to {if $type == 'category'}this category{/if}{if $type == 'content'}this content{/if}{if $type == 'page'}this page{/if}{if $type == 'index'}the main page{/if}.

category.name: ultimate.index
category.item: CMS: Ultimate CMS{if SHOW_VERSION_NUMBER} {@PACKAGE_VERSION}{/if}, developed by Jim Martens
Ultimate CMS: This is a rc version. Despite all tests there can be issues floating around. Please report them in the beta forum or on Github.
